meanings.definition: A lightweight, sheer fabric used for curtains or clothing.
meanings.sent1: The marquisettes fluttered gently in the breeze, letting in just the right amount of sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She picked out a beautiful marquisettes curtain to hang in her bedroom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got tangled in the marquisettes and ended up looking like a ghost.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like marquisettes, delicate and fleeting.
meanings.sent5: The marquisettes shimmered like gossamer in the moonlight, casting a soft glow in the room.

meanings.definition: A type of window covering made from marquisette fabric.
meanings.sent1: The marquisettes on the windows allowed a gentle light to filter into the room.
meanings.sent2: She decided to replace the old curtains with marquisettes for a more elegant look.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the marquisettes but slipped and fell with a thud.
meanings.sent4: The marquisettes on the windows were like a veil, hiding the world outside.
meanings.sent5: The delicate marquisettes framed the window beautifully, adding a touch of sophistication to the room.

meanings.definition: A decorative fabric often used for drapery.
meanings.sent1: The marquisettes draped elegantly over the furniture, adding a touch of luxury to the room.
meanings.sent2: She chose a soft marquisettes fabric to make new curtains for the living room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played hide-and-seek behind the marquisettes, peeking out every now and then.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, wrapping it in the warmth of the marquisettes.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the marquisettes added a touch of whimsy to the otherwise plain room.
